title: Tidal.Affair.Before.The.Storm-SKIDROW
description:
S  K  I  D  R  O  W
.the leading force.

proudly presents
Tidal Affair: Before The Storm (c) Overcurfew

25-11-2015......Release Date - Protection.................Steam
Action.............Game Type - Disk(s)....................1 DVD

RELEASE NOTES

Enter a race between two affiliates stealing supplies of what's become
a necessity to people to ensure their survival from a threat that
hovers above. Before the Storm takes you to the world of Alter Tides
through the shoe of a thieves in their attempts to intercept what's
arguably the most valuable possession to these people.

Features:

A Fresh new take on the stealth genre.

Isometric Cinematic Adventure.

Master the power of steering' your enemies.

Painted design, characters, and scenery.

Composed soundtrack.

Optimized to work on most computers.

INSTALL NOTES

1. Mount or burn image
2. Install
3. Copy the cracked content from the SKIDROW folder and into the main
install folder and overwrite
4. Block the game in your firewall and mark our cracked content as
secure/trusted in your antivirus program
5. Play the game with admin rights
6. Support the companies, which software you actually enjoy

GREETINGS

To all friends of the family and honorable rival groups

ascii art by the
godlike & terrific duo
malodix  irokos
titan artdivision
